articles.title: In the Ashok Chavan-Devendra Fadnavis meeting, a hidden political message
articles.description: Political leaders in Maharashtra say the meeting between Deputy Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis and senior Congress leader Ashok Chavan could be linked to the weakening of the Congress and leaders looking for alternatives.

Five of JD(U)'s six MLAs in Manipur joined the ruling BJP on Friday.
